price: Sila Inni samiileefi dachii uume fakkaataa isaanii uumuu irratti danda’aa mitii? Eeyyeen (danda’aa dha!) Inni akkaan uumaadha, akkaan beekaadha.
arabic: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: awalaysa alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin ʿalā an yakhluqa mith'lahum balā wahuwa al-khalāqu al-ʿalīmu
